message?: What you want to say to me ?
about_text:
Passionate young developer specializing in TypeScript,
        JavaScript, Vue, Php, and Node.js. Currently exploring Three.js. 
        Creative, efficient and ready to bring your ideas to life. Let's work together!
works_text:
My portfolio presents my first projects as a young professional,
           reflecting my acquired skills and practical experience.
            I'd be happy to add public deposits and live demonstrations.
             My career path is constantly evolving,
              and I'm proud to share these achievements,
               demonstrating my commitment to progress in my field of interest.
